name: The Smurfs Dance Party
summary: The Smurfs are back in an all new dancing video game, based on the best-selling Wii games, Just Dance & Just Dance 2. Kids and parents will dance to popular, top of the chart songs in this fun, high-energy game with their favorite Smurfs characters. The Smurfs' game is based on Sony & Columbia Pictures’ upcoming hybrid live-action/CGI blockbuster movie releasing July 29, 2011.

esrb.synopsis: This is a rhythm-and-dance simulation game based on the animated movie The Smurfs. Players follow on-screen cues to perform dance moves and score points. Some songs are based on contemporary hits, and contain lines that are mostly comical in context (e.g., “An' I Smurfed her just a little kiss,” “I was a Smurf-school loser/Never made it with a lady,” and “Her laugh, her laugh/She hates but I think it's so sexy”)

pegi.synopsis: The content of this game is suitable for all persons.
